long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the quiet strength of Xiao, the Vigilant Yaksha from Genshin Impact, with this atmospheric live wallpaper. 🌌✨

Step into the world of Liyue Harbor and feel the presence of Xiao, the enigmatic protector. This live wallpaper showcases Xiao standing against a breathtaking night sky, illuminated by ethereal lanterns that symbolize hope and remembrance. Perfect for fans of Genshin Impact, it brings Xiao’s noble solitude and fierce determination to life, making each new tab an awe-inspiring journey.

Key Features
🌙 Xiao in Action: A beautifully designed centerpiece of Xiao amidst a serene, lantern-lit night.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Effortlessly integrated for all your browsing needs.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Functional and harmonious with the design.
🎯 Customizable Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites quickly and conveniently.
🔗 Extension Management Links: Easy-to-find “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the bottom-left corner.

Transform your browsing experience with the calm power of Xiao. This live wallpaper will resonate with fans who admire the Yaksha’s resolve and dedication, adding a touch of Genshin Impact magic to every new tab.
